definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline

sentences.english: An absence of the exposure of knowledge-based assets will cause a seriously underrated evaluation of enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 对知识资产披露的缺失使企业价值被严重低估。

sentences.english: Underestimating the value of modern safety features.
sentences.chinese: 低估现代安全体系的真实价值。

sentences.english: Maybe Blomkamp made a mistake by underestimating the audiences' ability of understanding.
sentences.chinese: 可能布洛姆坎普有些低估了观众的理解能力。

sentences.english: Never underestimate the power of fresh air and sunshine to improve your mood.
sentences.chinese: 永远别低估了新鲜空气和阳光对改善心情所起的作用。

sentences.english: In particular, ecological risks should not be underestimated.
sentences.chinese: 特别是不应该低估生态风险。

sentences.english: But I should never underestimate Paul.
sentences.chinese: 似乎我不该低估保罗的能力。

sentences.english: Vida's also developed a great understanding with his keeper, Edwin van der Sar, which can't be underestimated.
sentences.chinese: 维达能很好的与门将范德萨交流，这点不容低估。

sentences.english: The effort involved in accommodating all of the stakeholders in the process of architecting should not be underestimated.
sentences.chinese: 在架构过程中不应低估适应所有涉众所付出的努力。

sentences.english: It is in vain, sir, to extenuate the matter.
sentences.chinese: 试图低估事态的严重性是枉然的。

sentences.english: Don't underestimate the changeability of the weather here.
sentences.chinese: 不要低估了这里天气的易变性。

sentences.english: That means we may have been underestimating the size of many dinosaurs.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着，我们可能已经低估了许多恐龙的大小。

sentences.english: Iran should not underestimate our resolve for self-defense, " said Peres.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗也不应当低估我们自卫的决心。

sentences.english: Therefore, its position in the history of modern woman in China is incomparable .
sentences.chinese: 因而，其在中国近代妇女史上的地位是不可低估的。

sentences.english: You should never underestimate the power of a good domain name.
sentences.chinese: 你永远都不能低估一个好域名的威力。

sentences.english: Can you stop underestimating the people's intelligence?
sentences.chinese: 请你们不要再低估人民的智力了好吗？

definition: to exceed/to overstep/to go too far/to encroach
to belittle/to look down upon/to despise
treat sth lightly/to lower one's guard
to regard as having good prospects
